txt.en:
'A good day to you! I am pleased to find another Minstrel has accompanied us. I should be happy to share what skills I have with you. First, though, I will give you some small advice, if you are willing to lend an ear to it.

'As you may already know, a Minstrel possesses a great power...the power to stir the spirit and raise hopes when all seems lost. When the spirit is roused, the body soon follows! A good Minstrel heals themselves and their fellows, staving off even the most dire wounds.

'Demonstrate your mastery by entering combat with the training-dummy nearby, then using the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Major Ballad</rgb>.'


HINT:

Minstrels use <rgb=#ffff00>Ballads</rgb> to attack their enemies, lightly heal their fellows and themselves. These skills operate on a rotating system that allows the minstrel to have three special buffs on themselves at any time. After the third buff is applied the next <rgb=#ffff00>Ballad</rgb> played will overwrite the first, then the second and so on.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Minstrel someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'

''Use my Training Menu to purchase your new skill, then enter combat with the Training Dummy and use your new skill.''

HINT:

Minstrels use <rgb=#ffff00>Ballads</rgb> to attack their enemies, lightly heal their fellows and empower themselves. These skills operate on a rotating system that allows the minstrel to have three special buffs on themselves at any time. After the third buff is applied the next <rgb=#ffff00>Ballad</rgb> played will overwrite the first, then the second and so on.
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.
